# DataCube AI

> Bilingual (German/English) weekly AI news aggregator curating tech breakthroughs,
> investment news, practical tips, and YouTube videos from 40+ sources.

## Content Sections

### Technology Feed
Weekly curated AI technology news (20-25 posts per week). Each post includes
impact level, category, source attribution, and bilingual content.

### Investment Feed
- Primary Market: VC funding rounds
- Secondary Market: Public AI stock movements
- M&A: AI sector mergers and acquisitions

### Tips Feed
Practical AI tips from Reddit communities and expert blogs.
15 tips per language per week.

### Video Feed
5 curated YouTube videos about AI developments per week.

## Public API
Base URL: https://api-production-3ee5.up.railway.app/api

- GET /api/weeks — List all available weeks
- GET /api/tech/{weekId} — Technology feed (bilingual JSON)
- GET /api/investment/{weekId} — Investment feed (bilingual JSON)
- GET /api/tips/{weekId} — Tips feed (bilingual JSON)
- GET /api/videos/{weekId} — Video summaries

Week ID format: YYYY-kwWW (e.g., 2026-kw06)

## Weekly Pages
Each week has a dedicated page at /week/{weekId} with full HTML content.
Example: https://www.datacubeai.space/week/2026-kw06

## Languages
German (de) — default | English (en)

## Update Frequency
Weekly (new content every Monday)
